pullrequest.title: Ogre 1.9 support: remove CEGUI and fix warnings (#994, #995)

content.raw:
I'm seeing a `UNIT_Visual_TEST` failure with ogre 1.9:
~~~
[ RUN      ] Visual_TEST.BoundingBox
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.9 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:82: Failure
Value of: newScale*bboxMin
  Actual: -1 -1.5 -2
Expected: newBoundingBox.min
Which is: -0.5 -0.5 -0.5
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:83: Failure
Value of: newScale*bboxMax
  Actual: 1 1.5 2
Expected: newBoundingBox.max
Which is: 0.5 0.5 0.5
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:84: Failure
Value of: math::Vector3(-1, -1.5, -2)
  Actual: -1 -1.5 -2
Expected: newBoundingBox.min
Which is: -0.5 -0.5 -0.5
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:85: Failure
Value of: math::Vector3(1, 1.5, 2)
  Actual: 1 1.5 2
Expected: newBoundingBox.max
Which is: 0.5 0.5 0.5
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] Visual_TEST.BoundingBox (3446 ms)
~~~
content.html:
I'm seeing a UNIT_Visual_TEST failure with ogre 1.9:

[ RUN      ] Visual_TEST.BoundingBox
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.9 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:82: Failure
Value of: newScale*bboxMin
  Actual: -1 -1.5 -2
Expected: newBoundingBox.min
Which is: -0.5 -0.5 -0.5
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:83: Failure
Value of: newScale*bboxMax
  Actual: 1 1.5 2
Expected: newBoundingBox.max
Which is: 0.5 0.5 0.5
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:84: Failure
Value of: math::Vector3(-1, -1.5, -2)
  Actual: -1 -1.5 -2
Expected: newBoundingBox.min
Which is: -0.5 -0.5 -0.5
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual_TEST.cc:85: Failure
Value of: math::Vector3(1, 1.5, 2)
  Actual: 1 1.5 2
Expected: newBoundingBox.max
Which is: 0.5 0.5 0.5
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] Visual_TEST.BoundingBox (3446 ms)
